title: Blessed Udoh
text:
Blessed Udoh (born ) is a Nigerian female <a href="Olympic%20weightlifting">weightlifter</a>, competing in the 48 kg category and representing Nigeria at international competitions.
She participated at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a> in the <a href="Weightlifting%20at%20the%202004%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%2048%20kg">48 kg event</a>. She competed at world championships, most recently at the <a href="2001%20World%20Weightlifting%20Championships">2001 World Weightlifting Championships</a>.
Udoh won 3 medals in the women's 48 kg category at the <a href="Weightlifting%20at%20the%202007%20All-Africa%20Games">2007 All-Africa Games</a>, but tested positive after the competition.
